opening_theme: #1: "Tonogata Gomen Asobase (殿方ごめん遊ばせ)" by Shoko Minami (eps 1, 11)
#3: "Monotone no Natsu (モノトーンの夏)" by Kayoko Matsunaga (ep 3)
#4: "Urusei Yatsura STARS ON (うる星やつらSTARS ON)" by Satomi (eps 4-7)
#5: "Lum no Love Song (ラムのラブソング)" by Yuko Matsutani (ep 8)
#7: "Pajama Jama Da! (パジャマじゃまだ!)" by Kanako Narikiyo (ep 10)
ending_theme: #1: "Good Luck ~Towa Yori Ai wo Komete (Good Luck 〜永遠より愛をこめて)" by Shoko Minami (eps 1, 9, 11)
#2: "Romance ga Itai (ロマンスが痛い)" by Kanako Narikiyo (ep 2)
#4: "Urusei Yatsura STARS ON (うる星やつらSTARS ON)" by Satomi (eps 4-7)
#5: "Uchuu wa Taihen da! (宇宙は大ヘンだ!)" by Yuko Matsutani (ep 8, 10)
